component.name: createReceiptRuleSet
component.description: Creates an empty receipt rule set.

component.name: listReceiptRuleSets
component.description: Lists the receipt rule sets that exist under your AWS account.

component.name: deleteReceiptRuleSet
component.description: Deletes the specified receipt rule set and all of the receipt rules it contains.

component.name: describeReceiptRuleSet
component.description: Returns the details of the specified receipt rule set.

component.name: describeActiveReceiptRuleSet
component.description: Returns the metadata and receipt rules for the receipt rule set that is currently active.

component.name: describeReceiptRule
component.description: Returns the details of the specified receipt rule.

component.name: setReceiptRulePosition
component.description: Sets the position of the specified receipt rule in the receipt rule set.

component.name: setActiveReceiptRuleSet
component.description: Sets the specified receipt rule set as the active receipt rule set.
